definitions.definition: The act of persons or things that meet .
examples: Meeting him will be exciting. I enjoy meeting new people.

definitions.definition: A gathering of persons for a purpose; an assembly .
examples: We need to have a meeting about that soon.

definitions.definition: The people at such a gathering.
An encounter between people, even accidental.
examples: They came together in a chance meeting on the way home from work.

definitions.definition: A place or instance of junction or intersection; a confluence .
examples: Earthquakes occur at the meeting of tectonic plates.

definitions.definition: A religious service held by a charismatic preacher in small towns in the United States .
An administrative unit in the Religious Society of Friends (Quakers).
examples: Denver meeting is a part of Intermountain yearly meeting .

main_definition: ( gerund , uncountable ) The act of persons or things that meet .
secondary_definitions: A gathering of persons for a purpose; an assembly .
( collective ) The people at such a gathering.
An encounter between people, even accidental.
A place or instance of junction or intersection; a confluence .
( rustic US , dated ) A religious service held by a charismatic preacher in small towns in the United States .
( Quakerism ) An administrative unit in the Religious Society of Friends (Quakers).
